data.benefits: Scheme provides one time assistance up to Rs.50 lakhs per project for undertaking R&D activities .
data.eligibility: All existing Academic and Rresearch and Development Institutes are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The academic collaborator should be an Indian Institution ranked in Top 100 in the India Rankings (Latest year) published by Ministry of Human Resource Development. 
  2. The Industry Collaborator must have a Udyam Regitration Certificate (URC) and Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  3. The Industry Collaborator should not be placed in restrictive list by State Government. 
  4. The Industry Collaborator should have obtained No objection certificate.
data.beneficiaries: All existing Academic and Rresearch and Development Institutes are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The academic collaborator should be an Indian Institution ranked in Top 100 in the India Rankings (Latest year) published by Ministry of Human Resource Development. 
  2. The Industry Collaborator must have a Udyam Regitration Certificate (URC) and Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  3. The Industry Collaborator should not be placed in restrictive list by State Government. 
  4. The Industry Collaborator should have obtained No objection certificate.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: The scheme proposes to enable productive academic co-operation by supporting the critical technologies that can catalyze impact making research.
data.objective: To promote Industry to collaborate with premier academic and R&D institutes for development of new technologies for scientific and technologies research.
data.description: Scheme provides one time assistance up to Rs.50 lakhs per project for undertaking R&D activities.
data.how_to_apply:
Application in the prescribed Form for the assistance, along with listed documents would be submitted to the Director/ DirectorGeneral, Industries & Commerce/Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, through the web portal of the department. 

Annexure-I : https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2022/06/2022060290.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industry - Society, Private Limited Company, Public Company, Limited Liability Partnership - Haryana - All MSMEs
